Description: Lovely lower Allston/Brighton apartment available right off of Western Ave. This unit features large rooms with hardwood flooring. Windows for natural lighting. A renovated kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher and plenty of cabinet space. Laundry available on site. Parking available for rent. Available 9/1/23!
